document.heading: St. Martin’s Apartment Tax Exemption Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-355, the “St. Martin’s Apartment Tax Exemption Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-587 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 16, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-689 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-355 became effective on March 25, 2009.
